target: i never knew my mom , she died when i was little
context: <user> hello how are you ?  <system>  him good just got home <user> me too . the bus takes forever from the high school .  <system>  traffic was crazy on the way back from whittling convention held at the community college <user> i hate traffic . my marching band held up traffic for hours last week .  <system>  my foster dad showed me folk music is the best in traffic <user> your foster dad sounds cool . my mother is so awesome ! ! !  <system>  high school is cool but best days were in community college<user> i hope to graduate this year before i turn 22  <system>  maybe you can go to the navy like me after graduation ?<user> maybe ? i like to watch greys anatomy and hope to be a dr ! !  <system>  oh i studied communications , it was easier<user> my mom does all my communication for me . its wonderful ! i love her .  <system>
